subject: Partially relieved order #SSN5002
description_text:
Hello. I am writing you to see what the status is for my pedal haptics I
ordered #SSN5002. I did get the pedals, which I am very happy with, but I
did not fet the haptic motors. If you could get back with me ASAP on the
status of these item I would greatly appreciate it.

Thank you,
Brian

conversations.body_text: Hi Wargraven Builds,     Here is the shipping tracking information for your motor.Â
